t:
As he was being escorted by the police for murdering his daughter, his wife fell to her knees, crying.



As people tried to console her, they didn't realize that she was actually trying to hide her laughter, having got away with the crime.
c:
She stopped laughing when she looked up and saw her dead daughter standing in front of her.



#husband #murder #daughter #caught #wife #plan #escape #hide
